definitions.definition: The material of the outside or front side , as of a wall or building .
The communicative strategies involved in upholding face or social prestige .
Work done at the face , such as the coalface .

main_definition: The material of the outside or front side , as of a wall or building .
secondary_definitions: ( sociology , psychology ) The communicative strategies involved in upholding face or social prestige .
( mining ) Work done at the face , such as the coalface .
